data.title: Do You Know These Famous Soccer Players?
data.meta_description: Futbol is the most popular sport in the world. Well, soccer, that is, to Americans. Soccer players are true athletes. They define the word. In this quiz, we're going to test your knowledge of the most famous soccer legends.
data.text:
Image: YouTube

About This Quiz

Futbol is the most popular sport in the world. Well, soccer, that is, to Americans. Soccer players are true athletes. They define the word. In this quiz, we're going to test your knowledge of the most famous soccer legends.

Who is the most famous soccer player who ever lived?

Muhammad Ali

Pelé

David Beckham

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Move aside, David Beckham. Pelé is the most famous soccer player who ever lived. Pelé hails from Brazil.

Where is Diego Maradona from?

Brazil

Spain

Argentina

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Diego Maradona is an Argentinian footballer. Some regard him as one of the best players that ever lived.

Who is one of the most famous players for Spanish club FC Barcelona?

Juan Pablo

Marco Sanrio

Lionel Messi

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Lionel Messi is a famous Argentinian footballer who plays for FC Barcelona. He plays forward, and folks call him Leo.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who is nicknamed Zizou?

Zimora Zoso

Zinedine Zidane

Zaro Zickamore

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Zinedine Zidane goes by the nickname of Zizou. He hails from France and is the coach of Real Madrid Castilla.

Which player is called "the phenomenon"?

Jacques

Ronaldo

Fernando

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Ronaldo is known as "the phenomenon." His real name is Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima, and he comes from Brazil.

What Brazilian athlete played for the Mexican club Querétaro?

Julio Sanchez

Pablo

Ronaldinho

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Ronaldinho is otherwise known as Ronaldo de Assis Moreira. He won the FIFA World Player of the Year award twice.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Hendrik Johannes Cruijff comes from where?

The Netherlands

Germany

France

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Hendrik Johannes Cruijff hails from the Netherlands. He is a former Dutch footballer that won the Ballon d'Or three times in the 1970s.

What former German footballer was named Der Kaiser?

Fritz Reinhardt

Hans Stiltz

Franz Beckenbauer

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Franz Beckenbauer is a former German player and now manager. He is regarded as the best German footballer of all time.

Which Portuguese footballer plays for Spanish club Real Madrid C.F.?

Rodrigo Stanto

Cristiano Ronaldo

Jorge Espinoza

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Cristiano Ronaldo is a Portuguese player for Real Madrid C.F. His full name is Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Which professional player is known as Gigi?

Guilio Tanti

Guizzeremo Giana

Gianluigi Buffon

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Gianluigi Buffon is an Italian goalkeeper known as Gigi. He was born in Carrera, Italy.

What Italian footballer could play with either foot?

Romano Lazzi

Paolo Maldini

Stefano Grimaldi

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Paolo Maldini was a former Italian footballer that could play with either foot. He played as a left back or central defender.

Which Dutch footballer played for Ajax and A.C. Milan?

Hans Utrecht

Milo van Dormen

Marco van Basten

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Marco van Basten was a former Dutch footballer who played for Milan. He also coached for the Netherlands national team.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Where was George Best from?

Sweden

Ireland

Wales

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

George Best hailed from Ireland. He played as a winger for Manchester United and the Northern Ireland national team.

Whose nickname was Garrincha?

Domino Consuela

Jesus de Puebla

Manuel Francisco dos Santos

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Manuel Francisco dos Santos was more commonly known as Garrincha. He was a Brazilian footballer known as Mané to his friends.

Where is Andrés Iniesta from?

Mexico

Chile

Spain

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Andrés Iniesta hails from Spain. He plays for FC Barcelona and the Spain national team as a central midfielder.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who goes by the unfortunate name of Kaká?

Ricardo Izecson dos Santos Leite

Georgio Montgomery

Jedidiah Karmen

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Ricardo Izecson dos Santos Leite goes by the name of Kaka. He is both Italian and Brazilian.

Which Italian player is a free-kick specialist?

Andrea Pirlo

Marco Salici

Alessandro Brogia

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Andrea Pirlo is an Italian player that is a free-kick specialist. He plays for the Italian Serie A club Juventus and the Italian national team.

Which player is known as Zico?

Marco Zimmerman

Arthur Antunes Coimbra

Pablo Giancarlo

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Arthur Antunes Coimbra is more commonly known as Zico. He is from Brazil and is often called the "White Pelé."

Advertisement

Advertisement

Xavier Hernández i Creus is known as _____ ?

Creus

Xavi

Xack

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Xavier "Xavi" Hernández i Creus is from Spain. He plays for Qatari club Al Sadd as a central midfielder.

Who is Gerd Müller?

A retired German footballer

A cleat innovator

A German football manager

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Gerd Müller is a retired German footballer. He is called one of the greatest goal scorers of all time.

Where is Thierry Henry from?

Jamaica

Spain

France

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Thierry Henry is from France. He is a retired player who played for Monaco, Juventus, Barcelona, and the New York Red Bulls.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Where is Zlatan Ibrahimović from?

Sweden

Austria

Poland

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Zlatan Ibrahimović is a Swedish professional footballer. He played for French club Paris Saint-Germain and the Swedish national team, and currently plays for Manchester.

Which of these players is from the Netherlands?

Ferenc Puskás

Ruud Gullit

Roberto Carlos

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Ruud Gullit is a famous player from the Netherlands. He played professionally in the 1980s and 1990s.

Where is Eusébio from?

Zimbabwe

Mozambique

Russia

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Eusébio was from Mozambique. His full name is Eusébio da Silva Ferreira, and he's considered one of the greatest players of all time.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Which of these players became a politician?

Zazu

Romário

Jorge

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Romário was a retired Brazilian footballer who then became a politician. He helped Brazil win the 1994 FIFA World Cup.

Which Dutch footballer is now the assistant manager to Frank de Boer at Ajax?

Dennis Bergkamp

Hans Zimmerman

Claud Shoenberg

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Dennis Bergkamp is the former Dutch footballer turned assistant manager. He was a forward from Amsterdam.

Where was David Beckham born?

London

Wales

Scotland

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

David Beckham is England's most famous footballer. He was born in Leytonstone, London, United Kingdom.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who is considered one of the greatest defenders of all time?

Franco Baresi

Armando Pesa

Niles Greenwich

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Franco Baresi is considered to be one of the greatest defenders of all time. He was born in Travagliato, Italy.

Which player is the former president of the technical sector of the Italian Football Federation?

Jack White

Herbert Mondavi

Roberto Baggio

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Roberto Baggio is a former Italian footballer. He went on to be president of the technical sector of the Italian Football Federation.

Which French footballer is regarded as one of the best of all time?

Pierre Costard

Julie San Ruffino

Michel Platini

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Michel Platini is considered to be one of the best footballers to ever come out of France. He has been the president of the Union of European Football Associations since 2007.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Advertisement

Advertisement

Who did Raúl play for, until his retirement?

New York Cosmos

LA Galaxy

Seattle Sounders

Correct Answer

Wrong Answer

Raúl, who is Raúl González Blanco, last played for the New York Cosmos. He is a Spanish professional footballer.

You Got:

/35

YouTube
